attributes.description: A/C, ABS, Airbags, Bluetooth, Central Locking, Climate Control, Electric Mirrors, Electric Windows, Full Service History, Keyless Entry, LED Headlights, Mags, Multi-Functional Steering Wheel, Navigation, P/S, Parking Sensors, PDC, Radio/CD, Reverse Camera, USB, Xenon Lights, Balance of 5 Years or 150 000km Mechanical Warranty & 3 Years 45 000km Service Plan. BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager - Ernest Smith As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience but potentially a life-long partnership. To find out more about this vehicle, contact the dealer now

attributes.description: Monstrous Power That Will Catapult You To The Horizon Combined With Pure Luxury And Loads Of Space. Our 2015 Model BMW M5 Is Beautifully Appointed In Alpine White With Silverstone Merino Leather And Aluminium Interior Trim. This ACCIDENT FREE Sport Sedan Has A LOW MILEAGE Of Only 36 000 km And Retains A Full Service History. Amazing Features Include Competition Package, M Twin-Clutch Trasmission With Drivetronic, Titanium Active Exhaust, Imported 21 Inch Vorsteiner Alloy Wheels, A Glass Sunroof, Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera, BMW Adaptive LED Headlights, Head Up Display, High Beam Assistant, Driving Assistant, Road Sign Detection, Harmon Kardon Surround Sound System, Satellite Navigation, Comfort Telephony With Enhanced Smartphone, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Electric Seats With Memory, Heated Seats, Preparation For BMW Connected Drive Services, USB And Auxiliary Input, Automatic Climate Control With 4-Zone Control, Rear Entertainment, Rear Privacy Blinds, Soft Close Doors, Electric Rear Sun Vizor, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And Electric Boot Lid. WOW! This Vehicle Is Superbly Specced. Come And View It Today! Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
